org.openimaj.math.geometry.transforms

Class RigidTransformModel3d

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.math.geometry.transforms.AffineTransformModel3d
      • org.openimaj.math.geometry.transforms.RigidTransformModel3d
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, MatrixTransformProvider, EstimatableModel<Point3d,Point3d>, Model<Point3d,Point3d>

    public class RigidTransformModel3d
extends AffineTransformModel3d
implements MatrixTransformProvider
    Concrete implementation of a model of a 3D rigid transform with only rotation and translation allowed. Capable of least-squares estimate of model parameters.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare
    See Also:
    TransformUtilities.rigidMatrix(List)

      • estimate

        public boolean estimate(List<? extends IndependentPair<Point3d,Point3d>> data)
        Description copied from interface: EstimatableModel
        Estimates the model from the observations in the list of data. The data must contain at least EstimatableModel.numItemsToEstimate() pairs of dependent and independent data. It may contain more, in which case the estimate method may choose to make use of this data for validation, or obtaining a better model by a least squares method for example.
        Specified by:
        estimate in interface EstimatableModel<Point3d,Point3d>
        Overrides:
        estimate in class AffineTransformModel3d
        Parameters:
        data - Data with which to estimate the model
        Returns:
        true if a successful estimate was made, false otherwise
        See Also:
        EstimatableModel.numItemsToEstimate()

      • numItemsToEstimate

        public int numItemsToEstimate()
        Specified by:
        numItemsToEstimate in interface EstimatableModel<Point3d,Point3d>
        Overrides:
        numItemsToEstimate in class AffineTransformModel3d
        Returns:
        The minimum number of observations required to estimate the model.
